entry.title: Spunk_22
entry.content:
theater anundpfirsich invites you to the 10th and last edition of SPUNK, the Zurich Improtheater Festival.

From October 10 to 16, 2022, the festival ensemble shows with top-class guests from the USA, Great Britain, Poland, Germany, the Netherlands, Austria, Slovenia and Switzerland what improvised theater has to offer. The audience...
